page.title: 01General
page.content: In our area there is one small village called Barston.Most of the area is farmland with a few woodlands.There are 14 farms on the map.There is a river called the River Blythe.It has trout in it.There are lots of footpaths in the fields,and there are very few buildings.As well as our school ,there is a special school called Springfield House, two churches and some old almshouses. In the eastern part of the block is the enlarged village of Balsall Common. Several large housing estates have been built here giving a combination of commuter suburb and rural community.
